alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:35AM CST until January 12 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL CHOCTAW COUNTY... At 1034 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Crandall, or 16 miles southwest of Butler, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Butler and Toxey. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
